title: Stadio Giovanni Chiggiato
text: Stadio Giovanni Chiggiato is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Caorle">Caorle</a>, <a href="Italy">Italy</a>. It is mainly used for <a href="Association%20football">football</a> matches and <a href="athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a> meetings. In September 2014 the <a href="Italy%20national%20under-18%20football%20team">Italy national under-18 football team</a> beat the <a href="England%20national%20under-18%20football%20team">England national under-18 football team</a> 2–0 at the stadium.
